subject: Freestyle Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: Olympic freeskiers will compete in halfpipe and slopestyle, just as snowboarders do. The differences between the two- and one-plank disciplines, aside from the equipment, may be most apparent in the air.
snippet: Olympic freeskiers will compete in halfpipe and slopestyle, just as snowboarders do. The differences between the two- and one-plank disciplines, aside from the equipment, may be most apparent in the air.
